Package negocio.decorators

Class PagoDecorator

java.lang.Object
negocio.decorators.PagoDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, IAbonado, IDetallable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PagoChequeDecorator, PagoEfectivoDecorator, PagoTarjetaCreditoDecorator
public abstract class PagoDecorator extends Object implements IAbonado
Clase abstracta base para crear decoradores de pago.
